tasks.label: Build OpenGL (FreeGLUT)
args: if (!(Test-Path build)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory build | Out-Null }; Copy-Item -Force deps\freeglut\bin\freeglut.dll build\freeglut.dll; g++ src\main.cpp -o build\app.exe -I deps\freeglut\include -L deps\freeglut\lib -lfreeglut -lopengl32 -lglu32 -lgdi32 -lwinmm
